mapper.insert: INSERT INTO link (create_time, is_delete, update_time, comment, folder_id, icon, last_seen, name, sort_index,title ,url, user_id, visited_count ) values (#{createTime},0, #{updateTime}, #{comment}, #{folderId}, #{icon}, #{lastSeen}, #{name}, #{sortIndex}, #{title} ,#{url}, #{userId},#{visitedCount})
